## hpr1736 :: How I run my small business using Linux

 Hardware

System76 Galago Ultrapro - Ubuntu 14.04

Synology DiskStation DS213j

LG G2


Proprietary Applications

Synology Cloud Station

Wireframe Sketcher


Free Applications

pandoc

discount
-firefox

chromium

gvim

libreoffice

planner

hamster

todo.txt

gnucash

virtualbox

thunderbird

enigmail
stationary


california

ranger

L2TP/IPSEC vpn client

meld

deja-dup -> Box

Systemback

rsync
